<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create an artificial edge between FirstSU and SecondSU.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Make data dependencies from the FirstSU also dependent on the SecondSU to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// prevent them from being scheduled between the FirstSU and the SecondSU</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and vice-versa.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Fusing more than 2 instructions is not currently supported.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Create a DAG scheduling mutation to pair instructions back to back</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for instructions that benefit according to the target-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// predicate functions. shouldScheduleAdjacent will be true if any of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// provided predicates are true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
